name: GrowthMinds
slogan: GrowthMinds delivers inbound leads, audiences and engagement for scale-ups
description: GrowthMinds offers growth hacking as a service for scale-ups across the globe. Founded by a group of Finnish and British entrepreneurs, we use a scientific methodology based on a set of experiments which are executed by our team of growth hackers. The team selects the ideal experiments for each client, then systematically deploys them for end-to-end growth.

jobs.title: Advertising specialist at GrowthMinds
jobs.description:
GrowthMinds are a rapidly growing growth hacking agency. We are looking for a smart and super talented advertising expert to join our team and lead our top of the funnel campaigns.

Our advertising expert will have two years of experience running paid campaigns and will be comfortable on social media platforms (particularly LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter) as well as Google and Bing.

In return for bringing their expertise to help our clients, they will get loads of cool companies to refine their skills on, and an environment that allows them to learn and evolve quickly.

We're London-based so our ad specialist would also need to be able to work in London too. We have one day working from home and a cool office on London's South Bank with views over the river.

If you think this sounds like you - get in touch!

jobs.title: Conversion optimisation specialist at GrowthMinds
jobs.description:
GrowthMinds are a rapidly growing growth hacking agency. We are looking for a smart and super talented website conversion optimisation and landing page creation expert to join our team and lead our top of the funnel campaigns.

Our landing page expert will have two years of experience creating landing pages using a wide range of technologies, and of A/B testing performance to inform the best messages, styles and conversion points to deliver impact.

Our landing page expert requires:

- Expert understanding of Google Analytics & Hotjar
- Expert understanding and experience of building landing pages using Unbounce, WordPress and other plug ins
- UX / CX expertise
- Inate understanding of design

In return for bringing their expertise to help our clients, they will get loads of cool companies to refine their skills on, and an environment that allows them to learn and evolve quickly.

We're London-based so our ad specialist would also need to be able to work in London too. We have one day working from home and a cool office on London's South Bank with views over the river.

If you think this sounds like you - get in touch!
